item.description:
Hi guys

This is last minute but its beautiful out so let's hike! Let's meet in the parking lot at 10am. We'll hike for about two hours and maybe get lunch afterwards. My cell is 508-472-7900 if you are running late. Not sure if they have maps there but if someone could find one and print it out since my printer is broken that would be great!

From North
To the West Side of the Middlesex Fells: Interstate 93 South to exit 35. At stop sign, go left under highway. At next stop sign go right. At first set of lights turn right onto Route 28. Turn right into Sheepfold entrance.

From the South:
To the West Side of the Middlesex Fells: Interstate 93 North to exit 33 (Route 28). Sheepfold entrance is 2 miles up on the left

http://www.geocities....

More info:
http://www.mass.gov/d...
item.name: Middlesex Fells
